explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor setting, with a small wooden house on the left and some greenery in the distance, a little girl in a white dress is holding a chicken and standing in front of the small wooden house. The girl in the white dress is seen from the side, holding the chicken. There is some hay under her feet.

[0-2] First, the little girl in the white dress turns her body while holding the chicken, revealing her front. She is cradling the chicken in her arms and rocking it, with her face resting on the chicken.
